qualifieddc.dc:title: Carved flint macehead, Eastern tomb chamber, Knowth
qualifieddc.dc:description: Maesmawr-type ovoid flint macehead, with cylindrical perforation towards narrow end. All six surfaces are decorated. Discovered in the right-hand recess of the chamber of Knowth Tomb 1B East.
qualifieddc.dc:creator: National Monuments Service, Department of Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht
qualifieddc.dc:subject: Archaeology
Artefacts
